Class MaxHeapStructure.heapIterator

java.lang.Object
MaxHeapStructure.heapIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:

Enclosing class:
MaxHeapStructure<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
public class MaxHeapStructure.heapIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<E>
I use the Iterator for set the element to heap structure. There is set,get,remove,hasNext,next and remove method for iterator.
